quadrant.hdiamond.health.normal.name: Normal

quadrant.hdiamond.health.minor.descripti: Can cause irritation and minor injury.
quadrant.hdiamond.health.hazardous.name: Hazardous
quadrant.hdiamond.health.hazardous.descr: Can cause residual injury on intense exposure.
quadrant.hdiamond.health.extreme.name: Extreme
quadrant.hdiamond.health.extreme.descrip: Can cause serious injury on short exposure.
quadrant.hdiamond.health.deadly.name: Deadly
quadrant.hdiamond.health.deadly.descript: Can cause death on very short exposure.
quadrant.hdiamond.reactivity.stable.name: Stable
quadrant.hdiamond.reactivity.sensitive.d: Can become unstable in elevated conditions.
quadrant.hdiamond.reactivity.violent.des: Can react violently in elevated conditions.
quadrant.hdiamond.reactivity.readily_det: Capable of detonation in normal conditions.
quadrant.hdiamond.specific.none.name: None
quadrant.hdiamond.specific.reacts_with_w: Reacts with water in a dangerous manner.
quadrant.hdiamond.specific.oxidizer.name: Oxidizer
quadrant.hdiamond.specific.oxidizer.desc: Allows chemicals to burn without air supply.
quadrant.hdiamond.specific.simple_asphyx: Alters the normal oxygen concentration in air.
ghs.hdiamond.explosive.name: Explosive
ghs.hdiamond.explosive.description: Unstable material at risk of exploding.

ghs.hdiamond.oxidizing.name: Oxidizing

ghs.hdiamond.compressed_gas.description: Stored under pressure as a gas.

ghs.hdiamond.corrosive.description: Corrosive to metals, skin, or eyes.

ghs.hdiamond.toxic.description: Has an immediate and severe toxic effect.
ghs.hdiamond.harmful.name: Harmful
